languages.text: {n}У самой двери Соломон приближается к вам и понижает голос:{/n} "Если с делами во Дворце Правосудия покончено, то я хочу кое-что предложить".
{n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."
languages.original_text: {n}У самой двери Соломон приближается к вам и понижает голос:{/n} "Если с делами во Дворце Правосудия покончено, то я хочу кое-что предложить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Right at the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "If that takes care of our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."
{n}Right at the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a lowered voice,{/n} "If that takes care of our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."
{n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

{n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."
{n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

languages.text: {n}Gerade als du durch die Tür gehst, kommt Solomorne näher und sagt mit gedämpfter Stimme: {/n} "Wenn wir dann jetzt im Justizpalast fertig sind, würde ich Euch gerne etwas vorschlagen, sofern ich darf."
languages.original_text: {n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gerade als du durch die Tür gehst, kommt Solomorne näher und sagt mit gedämpfter Stimme: {/n} "Wenn wir dann jetzt im Justizpalast fertig sind, würde ich Euch gerne etwas vorschlagen, sofern ich darf."

languages.text: {n}Au moment où vous franchissez la porte, Solomorne se rapproche de vous et murmure :{/n} « Si nous n'avons rien d'autre à faire au palais de justice, j'aimerais vous proposer quelque chose, si vous le permettez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

traits.locale_text: {n}Au moment où vous franchissez la porte, Solomorne se rapproche de vous et murmure :{/n} « Si nous n'avons rien d'autre à faire au palais de justice, j'aimerais vous proposer quelque chose, si vous le permettez. »

languages.text: {n}正当你即将迈出大门的时候，索罗蒙走了过来，低声开了口。{/n}“如果正义大殿的事务已经告一段落的话，我有个提议，不知你是否感兴趣。”
languages.original_text: {n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

traits.locale_text: {n}正当你即将迈出大门的时候，索罗蒙走了过来，低声开了口。{/n}“如果正义大殿的事务已经告一段落的话，我有个提议，不知你是否感兴趣。”

languages.text: {n}En cuanto cruzáis la puerta, Solomorne se acerca a ti y habla con voz grave,{/n} «Si hemos terminado nuestros asuntos en el Palacio de la Justicia, tengo algo que proponerle, si le interesa».
languages.original_text: {n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto cruzáis la puerta, Solomorne se acerca a ti y habla con voz grave,{/n} «Si hemos terminado nuestros asuntos en el Palacio de la Justicia, tengo algo que proponerle, si le interesa».

languages.text: {n}あなたがドアを出ようとしたその瞬間、ソロモーンがそっと近づき、低い声で言った。{/n}「これで司法宮での用が済んだのであれば、もしよろしければ、提案したいことがあるのですが…」
languages.original_text: {n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたがドアを出ようとしたその瞬間、ソロモーンがそっと近づき、低い声で言った。{/n}「これで司法宮での用が済んだのであれば、もしよろしければ、提案したいことがあるのですが…」

languages.text: {n}Kapıdan çıkar çıkmaz Solomorne sana yaklaşıyor ve alçak sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Adalet Sarayı'ndaki işlerimiz böylece nihayete erdiyse müsaade buyurursanız bir teklif arz etmek isterim."
languages.original_text: {n}Right as you walk out the door, Solomorne moves closer to you and says in a low voice,{/n} "If that concludes our business at the Palace of Justice, I would like to propose something, if I may."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kapıdan çıkar çıkmaz Solomorne sana yaklaşır, alçak sesle konuşur.{/n} "Adalet Sarayı'ndaki işlerimiz böylece nihayete erdiyse müsaade buyurursanız bir teklif arz etmek isterim."
